Author: HopefulCurrent
Text: that's so true about boundaries - i feel like we're just bouncing toxically off of each other at this point. thank you so much for your kind words, they mean more than you know üíö

Author: throwawayedfeelz
Text: I'm sorry that you're experiencing it... It's hard, because the caring part of me is so concerned for them, but ED brain takes it badly... Comparison time goes through the roof... The best thing you can do (though not easy, I know... I hope this doesn't sound preachy?) is to set boundaries with them, ask them not to disclose anything particularly triggering/talk about specific behaviours/etc... For your own wellbeing ‚ù§Ô∏èI know it's not that simple of course, so regardless just know that someone hears you here, and I'm sending all the good vibes your way
